title: hire scripters that can actually make bots
body: Because riots department def cant make bots. As predictable and as aggressive as a bronze 5, skill shot accuracy of a scripter. Ive seen bots made by others that play like a gold player to the point you wouldnt even know if you played vs it. The fact riot just has these half ass bots along with the fact that riot doesn't do anything unless there is a 5k upvoted reddit post goes to show they give 0 shits about their game.
